summary: The sprint planning meeting concluded with the client approving the execution of sprint 'SP-001', resulting in successful updates to the sprint plan and associated stories, and the initiation of sprint execution by the AI team.

decisions.title: Execute Sprint SP-001
decisions.details: Client approved the start of sprint execution, with the AI team assigned to work on the stories.

sign_offs.what: Approved execution of sprint plan SP-001

actions.task: Begin working on stories US-010, US-015, and US-001
